Utility class for various guid operations.

getIds

public static List<IPSGuid> getIds(List summaries)
Get an list of ids from the supplied summaries in the same order.

Parameters:
summaries - the summaries for which to create a list of ids, not null, may be empty.
Returns:
a list of ids in the same order as the supplied summaries, never null, may be empty.

toLongArray

public static Long[] toLongArray(IPSGuid[] ids)
Transform the supplied guid array into a long array.

Parameters:
ids - the guids to be transformed, not null, may be empty.
Returns:
an array of long values for the supplied guids in the same order, never null, may be empty.

toLongArray

public static long[] toLongArray(List<IPSGuid> ids)
Transform the supplied guid list into a long array.

Parameters:
ids - the list of guids to be transformed, not null, may be empty.
Returns:
an array of long values for the supplied ids in the same order, never null, may be empty. All long values include the complete guid including UUID, type ID and host ID.

toLongList

public static List<Long> toLongList(List<IPSGuid> ids)
Transform the supplied guid list into a long list of guid long values.

Parameters:
ids - the guids to be transformed, not null, may be empty.
Returns:
a list of long values for the supplied guids in the same order, never null, may be empty.

toFullLongList

public static List<Long> toFullLongList(List<IPSGuid> ids)
Transform the supplied guid list into a long list of full guid values, including UUID, type and hostid.

Parameters:
ids - the guids to be transformed, not null, may be empty.
Returns:
a list of long values for the supplied guids in the same order, never null, may be empty.

toGuidList

public static List<IPSGuid> toGuidList(long[] ids)
Convert the supplied array of ids into a list of guid's.

Parameters:
ids - the array of ids to convert, not null, may be empty. All ids must specify the object type.
Returns:
a list of guid's, never null, may be empty.

toGuidList

public static List<IPSGuid> toGuidList(long[] ids,
                                       PSTypeEnum type)
Convert the supplied array of ids into a list of guid's of the specified type.

Parameters:
ids - the array of ids to convert, not null, may be empty.
type - the type of guid's to convert to, not null.
Returns:
a list of guid's of the specified type, never null, may be empty.

isBlank

public static boolean isBlank(IPSGuid[] ids)
Test if the supplied ids are 'blank', meaning null or empty.

Parameters:
ids - the ids array to test for blank, may be null or empty.
Returns:
true if the supplied ids are blank, false otherwise.

isBlank

public static boolean isBlank(List<IPSGuid> ids)
Test if the supplied ids are 'blank', meaning null or empty.

Parameters:
ids - the ids list to test for blank, may be null or empty.
Returns:
true if the supplied ids are blank, false otherwise.

toGuidList

public static List<IPSGuid> toGuidList(List items)
Get a list of guids for the supplied list of catalog items.

Parameters:
items - the list of catalog items from which to get a list of guids, not null, may be empty, all elements must implement the IPSCatalogItem interface.
Returns:
a list of guids in the same order as the supplied catalog items, never null, may be empty.

toGuidList

public static List<IPSGuid> toGuidList(IPSGuid guid)
Get a list of guids from the supplied guid.

Parameters:
guid - The guid, may not be null.
Returns:
A list containing the supplied guid, never null.

toLegacyGuidList

public static List<IPSGuid> toLegacyGuidList(long[] ids)
Convert the supplied array of ids into a list of legacy guid's.

Parameters:
ids - the array of ids to convert, not null, may be empty. All ids must specify a legacy guid.
Returns:
a list of legacy guid's, never null, may be empty.
